rooms.name: Lobby Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entrance area with Art Deco motifs, reception area for guests.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Large open-plan living room with natural light from multiple windows; incorporates Art Deco design elements and ample seating areas.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, designed for comfortable dining with natural light and ventilation; features Art Deco decorative elements.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen integrated into the open plan, ensuring good ventilation and access to natural lighting; designed in an Art Deco style with period accents.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom on the ground floor for a bachelor pad aesthetic, featuring large windows to allow natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Guest Bedrooms
rooms.description: Two guest bedrooms designed with sufficient space, light, and Ventilation; includes period-appropriate Art Deco detailing.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Fully accessible bathroom with natural light; designed to complement the Art Deco theme.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Dedicated private gym area with integrated ventilation and soundproofing; features period-appropriate decor and modern exercise equipment storage solutions.

rooms.name: Additional Bedrooms
rooms.description: Two more bedrooms for multi-functional use; designed to maintain a consistent Art Deco style with ample natural light.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: A dedicated study or home office space integrating period elements with modern amenities; designed for productivity and natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Balcony-accessible bathroom ensuring additional ventilation and natural light integration.
